name: EVA71_Tainan_Long_Read primers with UMIs: Primers used: 1_LEFT:
Reverse primers with the following structure: Adaptor3'-UMI_long-Genespecificregion (These are the primers used for CDNA synthesis)
Adaptor3' reverse primer: (This is the 1st round PCR reverse primer and is universal to all fragments)
Forward primers with the following structure: Adaptor5'-UMI_long-Genespecificregion (These are the 1st round PCR forward primers)
Universal Adapter with the following structure: adaptor5' (This is 2nd round PCR forward primer )
Note: Adapater sequences (Illumina) + UMI were taken from: https://www.nature.com/articles/s41592-020-01041-y#MOESM1
Reverse primers with the following structure: Adaptor-PrimerID-Genespecificregion (These are the primers used for CDNA synthesis)
Forward primers with the following structure: Adaptor-Linker-Genespecificregion (These are the 1st round PCR forward primers)
Adaptor reverse primer: (This is the 1st round PCR reverse primer and is universal to all fragments)
Universal Adapter with the following structure: AdaptorSequencing-Bindingadaptor (This is 2nd round PCR forward primer with Illumina adapter sequence)
